Project¶

class litrevai.project.Project(lr, project_id)¶

A project contains a collection of BibliographyItems and a set of queries. When the project is executed, it runs all queries over all items in the project.

add_items(items)¶

Adds one or more items from the database to the project.

Parameters:

items – Items to add to the project.

Return type:

None

create_query(name, prompt)¶

Create a query and add it to the project. Raises an error if a query with the given name already exists.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Unique name for the prompt.

  • prompt (Prompt) – A prompt that inherits from Prompt.

Returns:

Returns the created prompt

remove_items(items)¶

Removes one or more items from the project. Does not delete the items from the database.

Parameters:

items – Items to remove from the project.

sample()¶

Returns a random item from the project. Useful for testing prompts. :rtype: str :return:

search(search_phrase, n=10)¶

Performs a full-text similarity search based on the provided search phrase for all items in the project.

Parameters:

  • search_phrase (str) – The phrase to search for within the items

  • n (int) – The number of items to return

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

A DataFrame containing the matching text passages and their respective sources.
